title: 4187 - Varsity Football Cropped Jersey
description:
MATERIAL: 100% Polyester. 200 GSM.

FIT: Relaxed.

DESIGN: Introducing the Varsity Jersey, a cropped football jersey crafted from 100% polyester mesh. Featuring a ribbed V-neck and a distressed YoungLA logo printed on the chest, this jersey offers .

MODEL: The model in the first photo is wearing a size Medium. Weight 185lb Height 5'11.
